name: Noivern
description: The Sound Wave Pokémon. They fly around on moonless nights and attack careless prey. Nothing can beat them in a battle in the dark.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: Upon entering a battle, a single opponent’s held item is revealed, if it has one.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.description: This Pokémon bypasses Light Screen, Reflect, Substitute, Mist, Safeguard, and Aurora Veil.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be damaged by its allies' attacks.
